p: After acclimation, 15 chickens of each breed (except for Castellana negra and Broilers that consisted in groups of 13 birds, and Euskal oiola inoculated with H7N1 that was a group of 10 animals) were intranasally challenged with H7N1 or H5N8 HPAIV diluted in PBS in order to inoculate 10 5 ELD 50 in a final volume of 0.05 mL (0.025 mL inoculated in each nostril). Animals belonging to negative control group (2–5 animals/breed) were intranasally inoculated with 0.05 mL of sterile phosphate-buffered saline (PBS).
